title: Pica 2002
content:
Pica 2002   
   
2002-02-28   
   
National Design Conference Invites Designers to Take Their Creativity Further   
   
The Alberta Chapter North of the Society of Graphic Designers of Canada (GDC/AB-N) is hosting PICA 2002, a design conference, May 3-5, 2002 in Banff, Alberta. The three-day conference will feature prominent speakers from both the design and advertising industry.   
   
The theme of the conference is How Far Will You Go?
author: Michael Surtees
